breathing.text:
yayin da kuke shiga
wata al'ada

aika suna
cikin cikin
Orbital haikali
a sarari

dauka
numfashi

nameInput.title: rubuta suna

emailInput.title: rubuta imel ɗin ku
emailInput.subtitle: don haka za ku sami sako lokacin da sunan ya hau.

success.text:
sunan

yanzu an yi layi
domin hawan Yesu zuwa sama.

lokacin da
haikali a sarari
daidaita, da
eriyanmu
a Duniya

za mu aika
sunan
kuma za ku karba
sako.
